meanings.sent1: The twiddliest toy in the store caught my eye with its bright colors.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the twiddliest decorations for her room.
meanings.sent3: The twiddliest cupcake at the party had a tiny unicorn on top.
meanings.sent4: Her twiddliest necklace was a delicate chain with a tiny heart pendant.
meanings.sent5: The twiddliest flower in the garden was a tiny violet hidden among the leaves.

meanings.sent1: The twiddliest child in the class couldn't sit still during storytime.
meanings.sent2: He was the twiddliest person at the meeting, constantly tapping his foot.
meanings.sent3: The twiddliest puppy in the litter kept running in circles around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt twiddliest when she was waiting for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The twiddliest squirrel in the park was darting from tree to tree in search of acorns.

meanings.definition: Most intricate or detailed in design.
meanings.sent1: The twiddliest pattern on the fabric was a delicate lace design.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours creating the twiddliest painting with tiny brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: The twiddliest clock in the shop had intricate carvings on its wooden frame.
meanings.sent4: Her twiddliest bracelet was made of tiny beads woven together.
meanings.sent5: The twiddliest snowflake in the storm was a perfect crystal with intricate edges.
